This includes the provision of heat exchangers, thermal stores, pipework connections at the site boundary, and heat supply agreements to heat network operators. 13.36 Heat network operators supplying to residential properties should be registered participants in the Heat Trust scheme and each district heating network shall be a Heat Trust registered scheme. Where existing heat networks have not decarbonized, sleeving shall be applied for the connection of new development.
